Name: I do not care
Subject: Welcome to JobXprss
Message:
Hello!
Welcome to JobXprss! An intelligent platform to get all the great jobs in one place. We use advanced technology to match the right people with thousands of latest job postings obtained from numerous job sources. Apply quickly. Get notified for matching jobs.
Visit jobxprss.com today.
To get the best JobXprss experience, use the mobile app:  http://jobxprss.com/android
 

Also feel free to share any feedback/suggestion to improve our system to make it more useful.

 

Regards
JobXprss Team
